analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol:
	Contract MilestonePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1082-1083)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1472-1482):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1481-1482)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1482)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1272-1368):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1280-1295)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1299-1302)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1339-1341)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1339)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1272-1368):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1280-1295)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1299-1302)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1341-1342)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1342)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1236-1261):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1242-1243)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1249-1250)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1259)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1261)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1255-1257)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1243-1244)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1247)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1272-1368):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1280-1295)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1299-1302)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1332-1336)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1329-1331)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1336-1338)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1382-1400):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1386-1387)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1391-1392)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1393-1396)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1390-1391)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1390)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1717-1730) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1723-1730)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1723-1730)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1104-1106)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1086-1088)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#1088)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x51f81c6841a4cb44fd97b48575661eabaabd4e68.sol#290)
